answers.answer: I.failed the hour test and passed the 3 hour one.good.luck everything will be fine

I failed my one hr, and passed the 3 hr! Do you know someone that has a meter? You can check your fasting numbers and after each meal... I have to test again next week, but I've been checking myself so I'll know my levels are good
I have one I just don't know if it still works
Just found out that I failed mine too. Do you know what your level was?? Mine was 162. I'm nervous to take my 3 hour test because I'm scared I won't pass. Good luck with yours!

I failed the 3 hour one. Wasn't suprised because my family has this in the family. Very surprising I never did sweets. It would just mean that your body doesn't react well with a large amount of sweets at once. It's not bad. Your baby motivates you. And ever since I started this diet,  my swollen has gotten down :) and I'm 35 weeks baby is healthy and he will not be overweight :)
Im 25weeks & I have to take mine in 3weeks can u guys give me any tips? can I eat and drink or no?

Most women fail the first and not the second. I failed the second. Its no big deal. I check my sugars and I'm on a low carb diet I pretty much eat everything I use to (except cereal or juice) and my sugars are kept in check.
I failed the 1 hr glucose by 2 points and passed the 3 hr test good luck :-)
I had diabetes before I got pregnant its not a big deal don't worry
I had diabetes before I got pregnant its not a big deal don't worry
Thanks guys i just hate the thought of having any complications. My doctor already said something about my blood pressure then this came up just so frustrating. I am not stressing about it though.
I failed my first one but mine was so high she didn't even do a second one. The diet is easy and my sugars are nowhere near what it was the day I took the test.

question: I just got a call saying I failed my one hour glucose test. That's not wat upset me I am upset because now I have to take a day off work to go to the hospital for the three hour test and I don't know wat will happen if I fail that one :(
title: So UPSET!!!!
